question: The president is very popular among his _____ supporters.
The children enjoyed _____ their own pumpkins for Halloween.
It’s a _____ fact that not getting enough sleep affects your memory.
There is no way I am _____ for your break-up with your girlfriend. I only talked to her once!
You recent study habits _____ that you are taking this course very seriously.
We can make ourselves happier once we have the _____ of what we really want in our lives.
Sixteen kilometers is _____ the same as ten miles.
All of the different animals on Earth are important, so we need to ____ them — even the ugly ones!
Scientists often _____ the effects of climate change in their reports.
The _____ of our water resources is extremely important for our economy.
The book provided a very basic plan for _____ organizations to help save the logical environment.
We need to lower the _____ of gasses such as carbon dioxide if we want to slow down climate change.
Many people think a world war would cause an _____ for life on Earth.
If you study English a little bit each day, you will _____ improve.
I put my finger right through the paper — I didn’t realize how _____ it was.
My mother sold all of her stocks as soon as the stock market started to _____.
City traffic is a large cause of _____ pollution.
This type of butterfly lives in a forest _____.
We need to have stronger laws to limit the _____ of polluting gases, such as carbon dioxide.
Rats are an _____ species which did not live in Australia before people moved there.
Please _____ my new telephone number.
Since coming to college, I’ve noticed that I’ve _____ been gaining weight.
The forest was recently named a firefly _____ area, so you can’t go in without permission.
Farmers have to work hard to keep _____ insects out of their crops.
The need to protect our environment is quickly entering the _____ of the public.
My teacher worries that we are not doing enough to _____ the environment for future generations.
Our teacher taught us that diamonds are actually _____ crystals.
I can’t believe my father is in the forest _____ his own Christmas tree this year.
Covid-19 was _____ for the loss of tourism in the beach resort.
It’s very difficult to _____ bad grammar habits without a lot of practice.
Lancheng Bed and Breakfast offers guests _____ tours of the local area.
Red skies at sunset often _____ an approaching typhoon.
Whenever there is a period of bad events, people often call it an _____.
Be careful with those butterfly wings — they’re very _____.
I tied my shoes very tightly, and now I can't _____ the knot!
The _____ effects of the new airport need to be studied before it can be built.
We all left the meeting at _____ the same time.
Many animals are losing _____ due to human activity.
The professor was _____ for her ability to make difficult subjects easy to understand.
Taiwan’s birth rate has been on the _____ for several years now.
